sentences.en: Accidental inhalation of the powder can be harmful.
sentences.cn: 意外的粉尘吸入可能有害。

sentences.en: During inhalation, contraction of the intercostal muscles elevates the ribs.
sentences.cn: 吸气时肋间肌收缩,提起肋骨.

sentences.en: Harmful: danger of serious damage to health by prolonged exposure through inhalation.
sentences.cn: 有害的: 经吸入长期接触有严重损害健康的危险.

sentences.en: In addition, they exchange more air with each inhalation and exhalation.
sentences.cn: 另外,随着每次吸人和呼出, 它们交涣更多的空气.

sentences.en: Inhalation injury and carbon monoxide poisoning often complicate injury.
sentences.cn: 吸入性损伤和二氧化碳中毒使得热烧伤愈发复杂.

sentences.en: Inhalation of dust should be avoided.
Insecticide is easy to the human body by inhalation and skin absorption.
sentences.cn: 杀虫剂很容易通过呼吸和皮肤被人体吸收.

sentences.en: Objective To explore the mechanism of formaldehyde ( FA ) inhalation induced lung injury.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨甲醛中毒的肺脏损害机制.

sentences.en: Objective To study the therapeutic effect of Kebite nebulizer inhalation in bronchiolitis.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨可比特雾化吸入治疗毛细支气管炎的疗效.

sentences.en: Septicemic listeriosis probably develops from ingestion or possibly inhalation of the bacteria.
sentences.cn: 败血性李氏杆菌病可能是因食入或吸入病原菌引起的.

sentences.en: Skin test for blood, sputum aspiration such as oxygen inhalation.
sentences.cn: 皮试抽血 、 吸痰吸氧等.

sentences.en: The earliest disorder is emphysema after phosgene or diphosgene inhalation.
sentences.cn: 光气、双光气中毒后最早发生的病变是肺气肿.

sentences.en: They were taken to hospital suffering from smoke inhalation.
sentences.cn: 他们因吸入大量烟尘被送往医院。

sentences.en: They were taken to the hospital suffering from smoke inhalation.
sentences.cn: 他们因吸入浓烟被送进医院。

sentences.en: With each breath, take a small or inhalation and then completely relax.
sentences.cn: 每次呼吸, 做浅吸气和全身放松.

sentences.en: Xenon lung scans may be helpful in the early diagnosis of inhalation injury.
sentences.cn: 氚肺扫描可能有助于早期诊断吸入性损伤.

words.tran_cn: [临床] 吸入器；人工呼吸补助器
[临床] 吸入器；空气过滤器；吸入者

trans.tran_en: Inhalation is the process or act of breathing in, taking air and sometimes other substances into your lungs
